Core:PCProperties.Core:Property: "Find out when a person submitted a command last. The command additionally allows you to keep a tab on the person that will stay there until they either disconnect or return from idleness.\\r\\n"

"+idleness kalle\\r\\n Display the time since Kalle performed a command last.\\r\\n\\r\\n+idleness watch kalle\\r\\n Display the time since Kalle performed a command last, and send a notification when Kalle performs another command.\\r\\n\\r\\n+idleness watch kalle \\"Poke me, please.\\"\\r\\n Display the time since Kalle performed a command last, and send a notification when Kalle performs another command. When the notification is sent, also send the message \\"Poke me, please.\\" to Kalle."
